summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1916, for the improvement of Thirty-first, Avenue South, from Jackson Street to a point Seventy-five (75) feet south of Judkins Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, by grading and curbing the same and by the construction of all necessary drains and bulkheads; under Ordinance No. 19786, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
